title: WTB: T206 Destroyed Cheapies ($10ish and Under)
author: mintacular

posts.post_title: WTB: T206 Destroyed Cheapies ($10ish and Under)
posts.post_content: If you have any $10 ish (or dare I say under)  let me know.  I'm guessing the price point is too low, probably is, but what the heck.  Can buy multiples.  Any terrible altered condition etc works.....  I have a couple Mantles for sale maybe we could work out a creative deal.  Would also take T205s.  Thanks, Pat
